1b: ^I'm Thatch. Am I needed for more work?

s: ^No, I'm here for something else. Is that why you look like someone rolled you down a craggy hill? All the work?
^Good, I've been sent to find you. We have some things to discuss.

c-1: ^I'm in no mood for discussion. I've never been more exhausted, and the guards may return soon to put me back to work. Ask what you need quickly, and then let me rest.

1ba: ^*Thatch glares at you.* You'd look like this too if they put you to work like I've been. The guards can't let too many of us out of our huts during this lockdown so they just pick the biggest ones to get the most out of us. I just got back from working all night.

s: ^Don't complain to me, we've all got it bad right now.
^Can't be as bad as sitting inside all day. All I've got to do is sleep and eat. *Yawn loudly.*
^I didn't mean to offend, I was just curious what happened to you.

1bb: ^Look, I'll say or do anything to get a bit of rest. What will get you to shut up and leave me alone the fastest.

s: ^Fine, I'll cut to it. Kastor has a plan to escape. He want's you in on it.
^Hopefully "anything" includes joining an escape attempt, because that's why I'm here.

1bc: ^I understand, but I'm beyond caring at this point. Ask what you need, and then let me rest.

s: ^Fine, I'll cut to it. Kastor has a plan to escape. He want's you in on it.

1d: ^Escape? *Thatch considers it.* Maybe it's the lack of sleep talking, but never having to move another stack of rocks around is sounding pretty good right now. But you're going to have to do something for me, first.

s: ^What is it?

b: ^I want to make these guards pay for whatever they did to Slate.

2a: ^Screaming? Damn it all. I didn't... I should have been here.

s: ^I'm guessing the screams weren't from you then?
^Do you know what happened?

c-0: ^No, I wasn't the one screaming. I've been working all night, I only got back less than an hour ago. But I can guess what happened.
c-1: ^I've been working all night, I only got back less than an hour ago, so I wasn't here for it all. But I can guess what happened.

s: ^Sounds like you've got as much a reason to hate the guards as anyone. I've actually been sent here to get your help on an escape plan. Interested?

explanationOfHutState: ^I came back from my labors to find my hut ransacked. That's why there's all this rubble everywhere. These shacks are rickety at the best of times, and whatever the guards were doing in here while I was away has collapsed portions of it.

^I have a hutmate, Slate, that I'm worried about. He's got a temper, and he's made some enemies among the guards. But the guards haven't done anything about it because a lot of them are afraid of me. My guess is that those cowards snuck in here while I was away and did something to Slate, but I'm too tired to do much about it on my own.
explanationOfThatchsTask: ^With the two of us together, we might be able to get to the back of the hut and find out what happened to him. If you're serious about escaping, then clobbering some guards with me shouldn't be much of a request.
snoozing: ^*Thatch is slumped against the hut wall. His eyes are closed and soft snoring can be heard.*

s: ^*Wake Thatch.*
^*Leave.*

s: ^*Leave.*
^I've actually already found your friend. He was killed by a guard named Vazul.

^I will need to think about it. I'll be back.
